title: Kahlil Gibran's The Prophet
director: Roger Allers, Gaëtan Brizzi, Paul Brizzi
writer: Roger Allers, Kahlil Gibran, Hanna Weg
short_cast: Liam Neeson, Salma Hayek, Quvenzhané Wallis, John Krasinski, Alfred Molina
cast: Liam Neeson, Salma Hayek, Quvenzhané Wallis, John Krasinski, Alfred Molina
genre: Canadian, Family Features, Movies Based on Books, Dramas
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: A troubled young girl and her mother find solace on a journey with a subversive poet whose words captivate their hearts and imaginations.
